name: Perma-Joint™ Sealant/FS
description: Perma-Joint™ Sealant/FS is a dual cartridge system composed of a two-component, 100% solids polymer designed for applications where a resilient, fast-setting joint material is needed. The semi-clear, unpigmented material is packaged in a dual-cartridge system and comes with a 1/2” 30 elements static mixing nozzle and retainer nut. It is recommended for concrete and cement expansion joints in the general industry.
